thread.title: Volatility knocks Blackstone profit less than feared

title: Volatility knocks Blackstone profit less than feared
text:
Volatility knocks Blackstone profit less than feared 12:21pm EDT - 00:56 
Blackstone Group's quarterly profit dropped 19 percent amid the stock market slump. But as Fred Katayama reports, the alternative assets manager still beat analysts' expectations. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
